name: China Town: Drift Car Racers
description:
China Town: Drift Car Racers!!!
Be a furious racer on a whole town for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!

Features :
- Massive open world driving and drifting simulator
- Tons of exciting vistas to explore
- Realistic highly detailed sports cars and vehicles
- Full customization cars, create your own unique paint job
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps
- Dynamic traffic with real and intense traffic AI
- Realistic driving simulator, ultimate driving experience
- Realistic drifting physics
